    • Constructor Detail

      • SpyMemcachedSessionStore

        public SpyMemcachedSessionStore(@NonNull
                                net.spy.memcached.MemcachedClient memcachedClient,
                                @NonNull
                                com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper objectMapper,
                                int expirationTime)
        Create new intance.
        Parameters:
        memcachedClient - Spymemcached instance.
        objectMapper - Jackson ObjectMapper instance. It's an serializer/deserializer.
        expirationTime - Is a default expiration time for the session data.
        • If it's 0, the item never expires
        • If it's shorter than 30 days, the item will expires at expirationTime seconds.
        • If you want longer than 30 days, it's fine, just use an absolute time (time() + whatever).
